name: Chukka
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

traits.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, Chukka has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

traits.name: Mimicry
entries: The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Silvered Pike
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d10 damage) piercing damage.
